subject: Athletics and Sports
Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The day in sports included plenty of drama from the conclusion of Wimbledon’s first week, as well as the U.S. Track and Field Championships and M.L.B. action.
snippet: The day in sports included plenty of drama from the conclusion of Wimbledon’s first week, as well as the U.S. Track and Field Championships and M.L.B. action.
